title: Why do we need a third language (NEP 2020) in schools, when we can't have a conversational skill at the end? - Quora

response.answer_text: Now, that is a question of language policy. How it is actually implemented is on the policy makers. And who said you can’t end up being conversational by learning a third language. It is all about the course content, trained teachers and other infrastructure which will help the conversational learning. Obviously, the government policy makers should ensure quality educational content for languages. And they should also ensure that more emphasis is given to conversational skills rather than on scholastic / academic skills in these languages
